topic.title: [RAMBLE] will be back soon.
topic.body:
https://ramble.pw/
http://rambleeeqrhty6s5jgefdfdtc6tfgg4jj6svr4jpgk4wjtg3qshwbaad.onion/
> Check out ZeroTalk on ZeronNet or something in the meantime.
Let's wait! :D

1616562359_14bffrVoz5qMyCGxNsJRbCPoCMYPy.body: sosoon.png is broken! It's named ".png" but contains html. Rambler, you may take your time more!

RAMBLE is back!
I thought that Rambler would change Postmill to another site framework.

1617149531_16badkisTTGDcQf3YmZ9ra8b9Pnha.body: Network without any future. We will be 0 user network soon. It'll be the real __Zero__Net.
